text: Beryozovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Kuganaksky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 3 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 30 km from Sterlitamak, 14 km from Bolshoy Kuganak. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Beryozovka, Sterlitamaksky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
